description: The New York Times is expanding its coverage of Australia, New Zealand and the region – and we want to hear from you.
title: How Should We Cover Australia? Share Your Thoughts
title_page: How Should We Cover Australia? Share Your Thoughts - The New York Times
text:
The New York Times is expanding its coverage of Australia, New Zealand and the region – and we want to hear from you. If you have a confidential news tip, please visit this page for guidance.
Otherwise, tell us a bit about yourself and what you’re interested in seeing from The New York Times. If you're a subscriber, check out our new NYT Australia Facebook group.
